HERO.TITLE: Transcripta
HERO.DESCRIPTION: The ultimate tool to ace your next interview with features like voice-to-text and Screen Shot search.

ITEM1.TITLE: Enterprise-Grade Voice-to-Text
ITEM1.DESCRIPTION: High-speed, bilingual transcription with sub-2-second turnaround and enterprise-level accuracy.

ITEM2.TITLE: Code-Ready Screen Shot Search
ITEM2.DESCRIPTION: Capture screenshots without cursor artifacts and instantly extract text or code snippets for easy searching.

ITEM3.TITLE: Smart Resume Extraction
ITEM3.DESCRIPTION: Auto-imports key details from your uploaded resume to contextualize and tailor responses.

ITEM4.TITLE: One-Click Mode Switching
ITEM4.DESCRIPTION: Seamlessly toggle between behavioral and technical interview modes with a single button.

BENEFIT1.TITLE: Unmatched Stealth & Security
BENEFIT1.DESC: Runs invisibly on major platforms with password-protected access—ensuring complete privacy and protection throughout your interview.

BENEFIT2.TITLE: Personalized Performance
BENEFIT2.DESC: Receive responses tailored precisely to your background for maximum relevance.

BENEFIT3.TITLE: Effortless Efficiency
BENEFIT3.DESC: Instant transcription, Screen Shot Search, and mode switching combine to streamline your prep workflow. Easy to use, no need to install anything.

BENEFIT4.TITLE: Solution Reasoning
BENEFIT4.DESC: Explained solutions with step-by-step reasoning to help you understand the logic behind the answers.

QA.HEADING: Frequently Asked Questions
QA.ANSWER1: We currently offer a trial version. Some core features are permanently free, while advanced features can be unlocked through a subscription.
QA.QUESTION2: Can the platform detect Transripta during use?
QA.ANSWER2: No. The tool runs in a hidden window and displays no visible interface. Platforms like Tencent Meeting, DingTalk, Zoom, Google Meet, or Microsoft Teams cannot detect it.
QA.QUESTION3: How do I log in to the system?
QA.ANSWER3: Access is granted through a unique password distributed by the team—no account registration required. Each user has a secure, individualized access credential.
QA.QUESTION4: What modes can I switch between?
QA.ANSWER4: We support three usage modes: Behavioral, Technical, and Coding. The system automatically adjusts its output logic based on the selected mode.
QA.QUESTION5: How does the system generate answers quickly?
QA.ANSWER5: Transripta uses a dual-engine approach with local caching and cloud-based models, allowing it to recognize voice input and generate high-quality responses within 2 seconds.
QA.ANSWER6: We support many popular programming languages, including Python, Java, JavaScript, C/C++, C#, R, SQL, HTML/CSS, MATLAB, Ruby, Go, Swift, TypeScript, Bash/Shell, and VBA.
QA.QUESTION7: Are languages other than English supported?
QA.ANSWER7: Currently, we support both English and Chinese. We are working on adding more languages in the future.
QA.QUESTION8: What should I do if I experience a bug?
QA.ANSWER8: Please contact the support team through email. We'll respond as quickly as possible to resolve the issue.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us to Subscribe
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Ready to get started? Contact us via email or scan the QR code to add us on WeChat.
